ModuleDescription: Practicum is a compulsory module for candidates who do not have a Bachelorâ€™s degree in social work or equivalent. This module is designed to ensure practice competence by providing 400 hour firsthand, systematic and supervised practice experiences in the actual field together with seminars for integration of social work theories with practice. The stipulated hours should be completed prior to graduation.
Preclusion: Only for Master of Social Work (coursework) students with a Graduate Diploma in Social Work qualification
